Added automatic version checker with patch notes on server start
Completely rebuilt UI using React for improved performance
Redesigned unlocked folder with modular per-resource integration files
Upgraded to Lua 5.4 for better performance
Simplified configuration with auto-detection for framework, banking, and garage
